content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of Iron Ore, and my inventory now reflects this addition. 
# With both Coal and Iron Ore available, I can now refuel the Stone Furnace and resume smelting the Iron Ore into Iron Plates.

# Let's proceed to insert the Iron Ore and Coal into the Stone Furnace to start the smelting process.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 units of Coal into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 units of Iron Ore into the furnace.

# After inserting these resources, I will check the status of the Stone Furnace to ensure it is operational again.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)  # Inspect the furnace inventory after insertion.
current_status = stone_furnace_entity.status  # Get the current status of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Stone Furnace Inventory after adding Iron Ore and Coal: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display contents of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Current status of the Stone Furnace after adding resources: {current_status}")  # Display current status of the furnace.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the state of entities after the action.
